ygData.messageBody:
This was totaly uncalled for, and it is you who does not have the forsight
of what makes a good game. I think DOOM, or Street Fighter would better fit
your needs.

I am in agreement that if level 16 players can get together to take out
griffons or Giants, AND that group of players where all of one class then
this is where Verant needs to open it's eyes and make changes.

Your anology of kids with swords against a man is rather poor. I think a
better anology would be to take your same 6 kids and put them up against a
grizzly bear. See how long they last then. Put them up against true killing
machines such as fantasy Giants and Griffons, use real life Elephants,
Lions, etc and they wouldnt stand a chance.

Granted, Verant is making poor choices right now in curtailing certain
aspects of the enchanter class cause they fear it is too powerful. In doing
so they enter an endless spiral where now other classes are the powerful one
and must be changed. They need to find a better way at ballancing the game
then chopping away at abilities because a certain spell is very helpful.
Where that the case then Druids should lose SOW, Magicians should lose thier
destructive spells, Warriors should start missing all the time, Rangers
getter lesser tracking, Clerics get pathetic healing... I mean cmon..no
other class is being chopped the way we are.

And before anyone mentions this about being off topic, think again. The
changes going on right now in lessening the Enchanter class is far beyond
call. people are dropping this class like hot potatos. In time skills for
researching will be un-needed as no one will be playing this class, and/or
it will simply be removed from the character creation list. We are the
poorest solo class of the entire genere of classes. Pets that are levels
below us on the average, spells that fizzle, or are broken easily, no damage
spells to even come close to those who are lower level than us in other
classes. A total confustion in trying to explain to party member to not use
tactics that stun on whirled creatures or the stun will be broken.

We have no in game books that i know of on HOW to research, wizards have
volumes to find. This class is being totaly ruined and people need to start
stepping forward and letting Verant know that this class is being destroyed.
And the answer is NOT to ask to be able to take a hill giant out at level
16, but to regain the whole definition of Enchanter back as a boon to a
group, not a drag on a group.

We have the ability to enchant jewelry, but the costs are so high in making
something useful, that no player will pay it. We cant even enchant armor and
weapons LET ALONE make them as our very class desription describes. Our
buffs are lesser versions of just about every other race, and the duration
and cost of our anti-buff spells is a cheat on the very ability of the
Enchanter Class.

Having FUN is simply not being able to go out and pound on anything in your
path. Having fun is solving a problem thru the use of skills at your
disposal. But at the moment, the skills at our disposal are being ruined
cause a few power-gamers reached the impossible 50th level before they where
suppose to. This has Verrant in chaos. So in their maddened state they
change what should have been left alone, and leave alone what should be
changed.

Bah..i've said enough. I just had to put my 2 coppers worth in towards this
message. There is enough ignorance going on in ballancing the game without
stuff like this helping to turn the game into one big slug fest.

>> Oh my god I think I'm haveing a coniption (Must.... control.. Fist of
....DEATH!) Why on earth (or Norrath for that matter) would you support
Verant makeing it even harder for people to advance and have fun. By saying
something as innane and anal as that, you stifle team work and the desire
and adventure to try something more. To be dareing & adventurious is that
not what it's all about? People like you who condone such changes that
FURTHER hamper the fun, ease, and playabilty for gamers should be forced to
play Smurf warriors in Splitpaw or something. See, what retarted petty
people like you forget is WE PAY VERANT'S BILLS. and thus the game should be
free of the kind of asinine restrictions that you would have further placed
upon the game. Futher more, you say that it's unreasonable that a party of
18-20th level char take down a level 30 creature?!?!?! IDIOT!, If your a
grown man (which I highly doubt) and 6 trained 12 yr olds come at you with
sharpened Katanas (not to me!
>ntion SPELLS!) they would kill you even if you did have a sword you would
be swarmed and KILLED, as would a lion or even bear sure 1 or 2 may die (as
char commonly do in the aformentioned sitiuation. but the higher level
tougher creature WOULD DIE!. So take your petty, anal, Triffling mentality,
that would have us all struggleing even more for the modest exp we can
already just barely gain, To Hell (or Lavastorm in a pinch) and DIE!
>
>We need not further restrictions but, benefits to make it more fun,
>
>The Widows Son,
>Vastad
>Enchanter Cazic -Thule
